product_name: Fire Tiger Holo Single Hook Panther Martin Spinners
long_description: To reach out to long time Panther Martin customers who are now required to use single hooks or would prefer catch & release, we now offer four of our classic patterns with single hooks. Regular silver, Regular gold, all silver & all gold. These are our most proven patterns, now available for single hook Panther Martin fishermen.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
